summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn, New York, dated June 17, 2019. It details staff assignments, shift changes, leave statuses, and overtime occurrences for correctional and non-correctional services personnel. The document appears to be a routine administrative record from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: This document is a daily staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn, dated Monday, June 17, 2019.
The roster details assignments for 243 Correctional Services staff and 12 Non-Correctional Services staff across various posts, shifts, and units (e.g., SHU, Control, Lobby, Visitation, Perimeter).
It records numerous staff status changes including sick leave, annual leave, day off, overtime (68 occurrences), comptime (2 occurrences), and other leave types like LWOP-Military.
The document is a routine administrative record showing the operational staffing of the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was later incarcerated and died in July 2019.
Multiple correctional officers are named in connection with specific posts and assignments, such as escort staff, perimeter security, and Special Housing Unit (SHU) coverage.
